messages: @BecausImAGrl:I want to sleep with you. I don't mean have sex. I want to cuddle, my head on your chest and your arm around me and just sleep
"@LifeFacts: Rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots." # no one # ever said # you where #perfect
